inn1.comm: short of a good length on leg stump and Gambhir is away immediately, working it behind square for a single
goes for it immediately, short and wide and he chases that one, trying to flay it over cover, misses
short and wide it's been called a wide this time, chases that one as well, misses once more, was clearly a wide this time
fishes for it outside off, bowled from slightly wide of the crease, angling in, tries to open the face, misses
short and wide again, keeps a little low this time and Sehwag leaves it be this time, no movement, no swing in the air, so far
short of a good length on the off, rocks on the back foot and defends that towards extra cover, some inswing there this time, curved in
this one came in further and rapped Sehwag on the pads, swung in and landed on middle and leg to strike him high on the pad, would have gone down and was high
nicely done, pitched up outside off, appeared to curve in a hint, Gambhir reaches forward and pushes it past mid-off for a single

dropped, Sehwag's been dropped on zero, loose shot, short of a good length and he slices it towards point where, would you believe it, Tillakaratne Dilshan spills a straightforward chance over his head
Gambhir's got three in three, goodish length, gets forward and guides it behind point for a single
short of a good length on the off, Sehwag gets back and punches it towards extra cover, a fumble allows them a single

superbly bowled, 136.8kmph, almost a yorker and Gambhir was in a bit of trouble, was pace, landed just in front of the yorker length, Gambhir closed his face a little early and got a bit of a leading edge as he tried to dig it out
back of a length on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it to square leg

missed run-out, leading edge from Sehwag as he tried to close the face, the ball rolled towards point and Dilshan, this time, fielded brilliantly, diving full length to his right, that created a mix-up in the middle and Gambhir, running towards the striker's end, was gone had Dilshan hit the stumps direct, shaky start this for India

an unusual dismissal but Sri Lanka will take it, bowled round his legs is Gautam Gambhir, short of a good length on leg stump, he shuffles across to work it square, misses, it grazes the flap of the pads and knocks back leg stump, the hosts have struck early
short of a good length in the channel outside off, shoulders arms to that one
an inswinger from Kulasekara, lands full on the off and Kohli pushes it away into the leg side towards midwicket
short and wide and it's been punished, slashes it hard through point, that one held its line and was dispatched
in the channel outside off, keeps its line and he leaves that one be
fired in full on the off stump, lands on a length and is driven firmly but straight to mid-off
beaten, a bit of away movement there, short of a good length and just nips away, Sehwag pokes at that one and misses
a thick inside edge, pitched up and he was looking to drive that through extra cover, ended up going towards midwicket
pitched on a good length on middle and off, steps forward and pushes it firmly towards extra cover
rocks forward again this time and punches it into the off side, it's called a no-ball as he overstepped, and that means we have a freehit
lands full outside off and it yields just a single, digs it out wide of cover for just one run
banged in short on leg stump, Kohli tried to work it down fine, it's given runs, may have gone off the hip, we don't yet know, anyway, it's rolled down the fine-leg boundary
lands on a good length outside off, steps forward and taps that towards point
angling in towards off stump, Sehwag gets forward and pushes it straight to mid-off
nicely played, short and wide and it's cut away but the third man is squarish and that means Sehwag just gets a single
short of a good length and it moves back in, Kohli leaves that one alone
pitched up and he gets forward to defend that confidently towards mid-off
lands on a good length, presents the full face while playing it to cover
lands on leg stump, tries to whip it square but misses, is struck high on the pads
lovely shot, played on the up, on a good length, he moved back and punched it through extra cover and mid-off, timed it well
presents the full face again as he steps forward and knocks it down into the off side
full on the pads and it was there for the taking, tried to flick it square but missed it again, struck on the pads, stifled appeal, but that was going down
doesn't waste the chance this time, lands full on the pads once again and it's clipped away past a squarish fine leg to the boundary

beautifully driven but superbly fielded at short extra cover, a one-handed stop moving to his right to prevent a certain four, not sure mid-off could have moved quickly enough to his left to stop that
angling in towards off stump, rocks forward and defends it towards cover
just a forceful version of the previous shot, rocks forward and imparts a bit more power into this shot and gets three, playing it past extra cover
Sehwag gets forward and flicks that one away well, but straight to midwicket, angling in from Kulasekara
keeps a little low, short of a good length, chops it down on the bounce towards slip
a bit of swing towards middle,. Sehwag meets it with a straight bat, playing it back to the bowler
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and cuts it down towards point
lands on a good length on the off, angling in, defended towards cover
goodish length on the off stump again, covers the line well and taps it towards point
opens the face on that one and runs that down towards third man for a single
mistimes that one, wanted to thrash that on the up through extra cover but mistimed it towards mid-off
slower one from Angelo, Sehwag didn't seem to pick it, wanted to force it through extra cover, got a thick inside edge wide of mid-on, just the single
lands on a good length, Kohli opens the face to get it wide of point but a single is prevented
nicely driven from Sehwag, he middled that but struck it straight to the bowler, landed on middle and was met with a full face
not the most attractive of shots but an effective one, short on middle and Sehwag slams it over the bowler's head, just punches it from the crease
this one was attractive, got to the pitch and drove it sweetly but straight to cover
pitched up and he strikes it hard back to the bowler who gets a foot to it, kicks it towards mid-on and that allows them to sneak a single
Kohli reaches forward to that delivery bowled in the channel, defended towards point
mid-on is a little wide and Kohli has timed that very well, angling in, lands on a good length, he steps forward and just pushes it firmly past mid-on for a boundary, a quick outfield helps his case

That's the Sehwag we know, was a loosener from Mathews, landed in the slot outside off and Sehwag hammered it hard over extra cover for a one bounce four, almost went the distance, got the width he wanted
eases that one towards third man for a single
gets forward, slightly across, and drives that sweetly towards mid-off, landed on a length
opens the face and plays it on the bounce towards that gully fielder who stretches to his right, collects with one hand and prevents the single
angling in, short of a good length on middle, worked towards midwicket, no single there
can't pierce the off-side field, landed on a good length and was driven hard, but found cover
angling in, lands on a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and plays it back down the pitch

Appeal for a catch, superbly taken, but Kulasekara may have injured himself here! Landed on a good length and he mistimed a drive, was looking to clear mid-off, Kulasekara was waiting there and he ran forward and appeared to get under it, diving forward, but from the wide angle it's not 100% clear, a tough call to make for the umpires and Sehwag may just get the benefit of the doubt, it's difficult to say where there was any contact between the ball and the ground and whether he was able to collect it cleanly with his fingers underneath the ball. Sehwag gets the benefit of the doubt.
pushed off the front foot wide of cover for a single

dropped, but this was a really difficult chance, Thisara was in his follow through, Kohli pushed one uppishly to the left of the bowler and he dived to his left, stuck out his left hand, but just couldn't hold on
full outside off and that's been driven hard towards cover, straight to the fielder
short and wide and that's punched through point who's been pushed back, a single
crunched from the crease through towards deep cover for a single
angling in and that's been worked away through the leg side through square leg for a couple, 50 for India
excellent fielding at gully from Mahela, short and wide and that was cut hard, he dived full length to his left and saved a single
can't save this one, short and wide, cut down towards third man for a single
nicely done by Kohli, came down the track and took it from a length, drove it through mid-on for three more runs
short of a length, chopped over gully for a single down to third man
pitches it on a length, Sehwag was looking to drive that through extra cover but checked his shot at the last moment, played it into the leg side in the end
short and wide, gets on the back foot and cracks that through point into the deep for a couple of runs
length ball and it's been dealt with, on the off stump and he drives it hard over Kohli, past mid-on, for four more
short of a good length on the off, chops it down wide of point, just the single
shortish on the off, turned away through the vacant midwicket region for a single
lands on a good length on the off, eases that through cover into the deep for one more
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and forces it through cover for a single
tossed up on the off, drives it through the line to long-off for a single
shortish on the off, crunched off the back foot to deep cover
yorked himself there as he moved front and across, tried to drive it through midwicket, got an inside edge onto his shoe
pushes it down towards long-on for a single
bowled it flat on the off, knocks it through cover for a single
No stopping Sehwag from chasing those, a tempting length outside off and he looked to dismiss that through extra cover, missed
back of a length on the off, punches it through point and cover for a single in the deep
shortish on the off, that's been guided comfortably down to third man for a single
appeal for lbw, Sehwag did move across to whip it square, short of a good length, got a thin inside edge, they scramble a quick single
turns the face and works it gently through square leg, the fielder at deep backward square leg has a fair distance to cover, two more
worked away to deep square leg this time for a single
that's been driven firmly down to long-off for a single
bowled it flat on middle, a bit of turn, gets forward and pushes it into the off side
flat on the off, pushed away through cover for a single
on middle and leg, clipped through square leg for one more
flighted this time, Sehwag comes down the track and drives it through cover for a single into the deep
bowled flat on the off, crunched down the pitch towards long-on for a single
a misfield at midwicket allows them a single, short on middle, pushed towards him but a fumble produces a run
Herath, bowling from round the wicket, fires a wide down the leg side
short on middle, punched off the back foot to long-on
floating it on middle from round the wicket, worked in front of square leg for a single
quicker through the air, Sehwag was aiming at square leg, got a bit of an inside edge to play it short fine
easily done, landed outside off and he swept it hard, over square leg, for a boundary, connected well

flighted on middle this time, raises his half-century with a single to long-on, fifty No.38 for Sehwag, overcame a shaky start, was dropped when on nought, had a close call when he mistimed a drive to Kulasekara at mid-off
short of a good length on middle and leg, struck on the thighs as he tried to work it square
pitched on a length outside off, driven sweetly to extra cover, off the meat but to the fielder
short of a good length on the off, knocks it down into the off side off the back foot
short and wide, unlucky, Kohli made a bit of room and tried to cut that hard, got a thick under-edge and well past the keeper to the third-man boundary
steps out of his crease, trying to unsettle the bowler there, Mathews bowls that straight and Kohli plays it back down the pitch
bowled on a length, firmly driven down the ground, Malinga at mid-on moves to his left, dives and keeps them to a single
flighted on the off stump, drives that inside out towards extra cover
flighted outside off, tries to strike that harder but mistimes it to the same fielder again
yorks himself there, digs that out towards the bowler, Herath runs across and dives to prevent the single
comes down the track and plays that flat delivery to the bowler, four dots
gets forward and turns it past square leg for a single

Sehwag spoils the good work done earlier in the over by Herath, that's bowled flat and short on middle and he paddles it really fine, short fine gives chase but can't drag it back in, 100 up for India
Kohli comes down the track and crunches it towards deep cover for a single
angling in towards middle, pushed in front of mid-on for a quick single
angling in towards middle, drops it into the leg side for a single
shortish on the off, runs that one down towards third man for one more
on leg stump and missed an opportunity to collect some runs on the on-side, rehearses a shot trying to clear the leg-side field but was looking to work it around for a single
short of a good length on the off, knocks it down in front of point
superbly bowled, third man is up, a yorker on the off stump, squeezed towards that short third man fielder for a single
bowled full on middle and leg, tickled into the leg side for a single
a low full toss outside off and that's asking for trouble with the field set, slices that behind point and with a third-man up, that's four for the taking, brings up the century stand
attempted yorker on middle, drives that towards mid-off, collects a single
back of a length on the off, gets on the back foot and knocks it down to point
full on the off, turns his wrists to work it past mid-on for a single
flighted on the off, Kohli moves inside-out to drive that hard past a diving extra cover for a couple of runs
pushes this one more gently towards the same fielder
short of a length on middle, punched off the back foot to the bowler
short and that's been cut away towards deep point, a slight fumble and Kohli has a chance to run back for the second
gets forward to that flat delivery and clips it behind square for a single
flat on middle, chipped towards long-on, he has to run a few yards to his left and Sehwag can complete the second
floating it on middle, gets forward and defends it into the off side
curving in, drives that towards deep cover for a single
ooh, didn't go where he intended, ended up slicing it uppishly just wide of point, one more single
Kohli dances down the pitch, takes it off a length and drives it down to long-off, he's in some form, that's his half-century, 22nd in ODIs
steps back and punches that down to long-off for a single
pushes it down to long-on for a single
ooh, driven uppishly, Dilshan made an initial movement to his right, but that was played to his left, and despite a dive, Dilshan couldn't get a hand on that one
short, gets on the back foot and punches it to long-on for a single
comes down the track and cracks that to long-off for one more
short and wide, cut away hard towards deep point for a single
tossed up, comes down the pitch and drives it down to long-on for a single
Sehwag was looking to attack there, tossed up outside off, made a bit of room and drove it uppishly over extra cover for a couple of runs
gets on the back foot but can't punch it past midwicket, was hoping for a single there
curving in towards middle, pushed past Kohli into the deep for a single
short and flat outside off, punched towards deep cover
turns the face and drives it towards long-on for a single
comes down the track, gets to the pitch and plays it back to the bowler
pushes that one down to long-on for a single
driven straight towards extra cover
flattish on middle and leg, worked through midwicket for a single
shortish on the off, crunches it down the ground to long-on
shortish on middle, punched off the back foot to deep midwicket for a single
slightly short on middle and leg, punched to long-on
flighted on the off, makes a hint of room and smacks that over extra cover, just the single
gets forward and pushes it towards extra cover
comes down the track and plays that one straight back to the bowler
worked away in front of midwicket for a single, the fielder in the deep takes a while to get to it, easy two for Kohli
drops that one in front of point, Sehwag calls and completes the single in time
flighted on middle, driven easily down the ground for a single
short of a length outside off, cut away straight to point
short of a good length, tried to cream that through the covers, mistimed it to cover
dispatched by Sehwag, mid-on is up and he decided to clear him, stood his ground in the crease, picked it off a good length and smacked it over mid-on for a one bounce four
short of a good length, creamed through the covers, but there is a fielder in the deep, he moves to his left to cut it off, two more
short of a length, was looking to cut it past point, got an under-edge on the bounce to the keeper
driven in the air, two more wide of the deep cover fielder, India moving along smoothly
shortish on the off, cracked through point into the deep for two more runs
flighted on middle, drives it down towards long-off for a single
brings up the 150-run stand with a driven single past the bowler
angling in towards middle, turns it wide of square leg, it's a big ground with lots of open spaces and these two have run well, two more this time
shortish, kept a little low, punched towards long-off for a single
tossed up on middle, smacked towards long-on for a single
Sehwag isn't going to let those go, short and wide, in the zone for Sehwag and he slashes him over point to beat the gap in the deep

Sehwag's been fortunate this innings and he has more of that fortune this time, surprised by the short ball was Sehwag and he tried to pull it over midwicket, got a top edge and Malinga, running in from fine leg, couldn't get to it in time and moreover, it bounced over him, two more
back of a length outside off, runs it down to third man for a single
gets on the front foot and cracks it well but straight to Mahela at extra cover
short of a good length, squeezed through to deep extra cover for  a single
loose shot from Sehwag, was looking to cut that over point, the shot was on though, the ball was short and wide but he missed it
floating it on the off stump, pushes that one back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, smacked towards deep cover for one more
drives it straight towards extra cover, can't get the single this time
sliding that one down the leg side, there was some impact with the thigh there, so not a wide
short of a length outside off, chops it towards point, an easy single taken
worked away off the back foot past square leg for a single

he scored numerous runs using that shot during that blistering hundred he got in Hobart against the same opposition, too straight and Kohli whips that through midwicket for a boundary, uppish but safe and sweetly hit
too easy for Kohli and Perera's been too guilty of doling out that short and wide delivery this match, slashed over point for four more

Run-out, Sehwag is walking back, better from Thisara, he held back his length this time a touch while bowling it straight, Kohli dropped it into the off side, Sehwag wanted the single and had taken a start but Kohli sent him back, Thisara collected and did superbly to throw down the stumps at the non-striker's end to catch Sehwag short. He's missed his century
Kohli runs that one down towards third man for a single
short of a good length, looked like the legutter, defended off the back foot in front of point for a single
on a length outside off, pushed towards mid-off for a single
angling in towards middle, turned past square leg for a single
full on the off, Rohit gets a single as he pushes that past a diving midwicket
short of a length on the off, punched off the back foot straight to extra cover

beaten completely, he's found no turn with the conventional left-arm spin, but this one came back in, he's got the ability to bring the odd delivery back in, caught the batsman by surprise, as well as the keeper, was unlucky not to get him out bowled
played away into the leg side
pushed wide of square leg for a quick single
angling in, slightly short of a good length, plays that one back to the bowler
short of a good length outside off, runs that one down to third man for a single
on a good length, pushed on the up towards deep extra cover for a single
shortish on middle, turned into the leg side past square leg for a single
comes down the track and thwacks that towards long-off

Angelo's struck, two wickets in quick time, did that nip back in? Short of a good length, landed on the off and appeared to just nip back in, Rohit was late on it and was eventually beaten through the gate, it knocked back off stump
tossed up on the off, drives it down to long-on for a single
bowled it flat from over the wicket on the off stump, turned away to midwicket
flighted on the off, drives it down to long-on for a single
floating it on the off, comes down the track and drives it to long-off
slightly short on the off, gets back and punches it to extra cover
mid-off is up, Raina stepped out of the crease and got to the pitch, but was only able to drive it straight to the fielder
angling in towards the off, drops that one towards point
thrashed from Kohli, stepped out not for the first time to the seamer, took it from a length and hammered it past Mathews, there is a long-off in place but he had no chance
two quick wickets aren't going to keep Kohli quiet, on a good lenght and he delicately opened the face, third man was a little wide and he managed to beat the keeper and third man for four more
pushes that one back to the bowler who can't quite field it on his follow through, a single taken

Huge appeal for lbw, Mathews can't believe it has been turned down, struck Raina dead in line as he moved across but it may have pitched outside leg stump, if it did you can't give those out. We did see one replay but without the pitch map, hard to tell from there
Raina immediately attacks, mid-off is up and he goes over the top, doesn't quite get hold but clears the fielder nevertheless and picks up a couple
pushed it back to the bowler
flighted on middle, that's among Kohli's favourite shots, he stepped out, inside-out, and lofted that over extra cover to pick a boundary, another century on the cards for Kohli
crunched down the ground for a single
flattish on the off, rocks forward and plays it back to the bowler
drives that one towards long-on for a single to keep strike
pitched up on the off, pushed just wide of mid-off for a quick single, direct hit but he's comfortably in is Raina
full toss and Kohli pushes that meatily towards long-off for a single to move to 99
slower one bowled short outside off, pulls it square into the deep for a single
Century no.12 in ODIs for Virat Kohli, his fourth in his last five innings, full and wide and it's eased through to deep cover for a single, his prolific run continues, another excellent knock
pushes it full on the off, stays in the crease and digs it into the leg side
low full toss on middle and off to Raina, turns that through midwicket into the deep for a couple more runs
fullish outside off, pushes that through extra cover into the deep for a single
banged in short, Raina was in control there, moved back and pulled it to deep midwicket for a single
comes down the track and punches that towards long-on for a single
short of a good length on middle, gets across to drop it wide of midwicket for a single
bowls it full outside off, squeezed through extra cover for one more
short of a good length, played down the ground to long-off for another single
on a good length and it's driven on the up to long-off for a single
angling in towards middle, pushed back straight to the bowler down the pitch
comes down the track and chips that towards long-on for a single
nicely timed by Raina, played sweetly down the ground to long-off for a single
placed it nicely, made some room and chipped that one over extra cover, wide of long-off, for a couple of runs

Kohli has to go, a sharp catch at extra cover, was the slower one, Kohli picked it and struck it well, but he was looking to clear extra cover there but couldn't get the elevation, Sachitra Senanayake, the substitute fielder, presumably for Kulasekara, stayed alert and snapped it well
shortish on leg stump, turns it square off the back foot for a single
lands on middle and Dhoni pushes it back gently to the bowler
short of a good length on middle, punched it down the ground to long-on for a single
shortish on leg stump, dropped in front of square leg for a single
a goodish length delivery outside off, struck through point into the deep for a single
kept out the yorker and what's more, he's picked up a couple, was heading towards middle and leg, Raina moved across and managed to clip it past square leg into the deep
picked the gap between deep square leg and deep midwicket, the ball was a short one and he had ample time to move back, roll his wrists over it and play it through that gap for a boundary
sliding on the pads, Dhoni wanted to work that square, struck on the pads, a leg-bye on offer
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it to the bowler
slower one bowled on a length outside off, pushes it towards cover from the crease
punched past extra cover from the crease for a single
short of a good length on middle, turns it through square leg for a single
fires it full outside off, digs it out into the off side, thinks of a single but it's not there
full on middle, drives that one down towards long-on for a single
slower one bowled on middle and off, the offcutter, taps it behind point for an easy single
bowled it full on middle, drives that down the ground to long-on for a single
pitched on a length on the off, cracks it down to long-off
a yorker on the off stump, dug out past the bowler for a single
short of a length on middle, gets on the back foot and drops it into the leg side
back of a length on the off, turns it into the leg side towards midwicket off the back foot
slower one and Dhoni picked it, it was short as well, he pulled it hard to deep midwicket but couldn't get it past the fielder
slower one bowled on a length on the off from round the wicket, played it back to the bowler
short of a good length on the off, knocks it in front of mid-off for a single
bowls that full on the off, pushes that in the direction of long-on, Raina's the one running to the danger end when they decide on the couple, and he's quick, and makes it in time
a hit-me ball and Raina ensures it doesn't go to waste, a wide full-toss and it's been guided past point, no cover in the deep in that region and it's an easy boundary
full and wide, too much width, slices it down to third man for a single
an inswinging yorker from Malinga, dug out through square leg for a single
low full toss on the off stump, pushes that one straight back to the bowler

imperious from Raina there, appeared to have made up his mind there, had made a bit of room before the ball was delivered, Malinga gifted him a length ball outside off and it was absolutely creamed through extra cover
slower one on middle and off, knocked down towards point
short of a good length on middle, pushes it towards long-on for a single
five runs, Angelo goes round the wicket and fires a short one down the leg side, Sangakkara dives to his right and can't get a hand to it, Jayawardene will be livid
angling in towards leg stump, Raina wants to swing it over midwicket, gets an inside edge onto the pads, no run there
and again, he goes after that one, can't get hold of it, much fuller, gets a thick inside edge through square leg for a single
bowls it full on middle, driven down towards long-off for a single
third man is up, slower one bowled short outside off, guided towards short third, a quick single taken as Malinga fumbles
pitched up and it's driven hard but straight to extra cover
It's first six of the game, in the 47th over, a length ball from Malinga and it was the slower one, he picked it alright, gave it a good swing and connected superbly, cleared long-on easily
full outside off, squeezed that down towards third man for a single
tries his famous whiplash shot but doesn't quite work out, was too good a yorker to execute it properly, dug it out for a single to long-on
poor ball and Raina will be disappointed he didn't flick it fine for a boundary, but he does get three runs, a faint tickle off the bat on the pads and it rolls wide of fine leg

There's a whiplash, that was powerfully hit, Mahela's standing at midwicket, it was a juicy full toss from Malinga and Dhoni smashed it, Mahela was slow to react to it and it flew past him, not sure he got a hand, a missed chance?, tough to say
another full toss and this time Dhoni mistimes a pull to deep square leg, gets to him on the bounce
the legcutter from Thisara, came from the back of the hand, dug out towards long-on for a single
bowled on a length and Raina's going to cash in on those, swings it away between deep square leg and deep midwicket for a one bounce four
pitched up outside off, driven straight to long-on for a single
the back-of-the-hand slower ball again, swatted towards long-on for a single
full outside off, guides it down to third man for a single
fires it full outside off, Dhoni fails to make contact there, was trying to get it past point, a dot ball
another wide low full toss from Malinga, Raina guides it straight to point, gets a single
a no-ball for height, the full toss was just above waist-high, pulled towards deep square leg for a single
full outside off, tries to squeeze it towards third man, misses, a belated appeal from Sangakkara

missed run-out, got a bit of bat to it this time but Sangakkara stopped it, Dhoni had already run down to the striker's end as Raina was ball watching, Sanga threw the ball down to Malinga who failed to score a direct hit at the non-striker's end, that handed Raina a single and a half-century, a lovely cameo
the whiplash again and it works, full outside off and he manages to clear mid-off with that one, didn't connect as well as he would have liked but got four nevertheless

connected superbly this time, a big six on a massive ground by Dhoni, it's the whiplash once more, length ball from Malinga who's been flayed all around today, on middle and Dhoni dispatches it miles over the square-leg boundary
leaves that one alone thinking it'll be wided but it was well within reach, Malinga finishes his spell with a dot ball but he's received a thrashing

a meaty full toss but Raina can't cash in this time, swings hard, gets the top edge and Senanayake, the substitute, who's already taken one good catch this innings, makes no mistake. He was at square leg and he turned, ran a few steps and judged it to perfection

he's played that shot well this innings and he struck that one hard too, but the whiplash fails to clear long-off this time, Thirimanne, standing there, moves back a few steps and takes it over his head

Not a hat-trick because it's not a catch, the appeal for a catch was turned down by the third umpire, low full toss and Irfan looked to turn it to the leg side, was a bump ball but Perera didn't think so as he took it in his follow through, not out in the end
Irfan's turn now, low full toss and it's been smashed over midwicket, big gap in that region and it's a boundary

dropped, Thirimanne, who took a good catch at long-off earlier in the over, spills a straightforward chance at long-on to the left-hander, pitched up and it's struck straight towards him but he puts it down running forward
swung away into the leg side into the deep for a single

inn2.comm: beaten first up, lovely ball, lands on a good length and nips away to just evade Tharanga's poke
follows that delivery up with a wide down the leg side, Dhoni does well to get across and stop it, Sri Lanka are off the mark
short and wide and Dilshan starts off in style, plenty of width there for the batsman and he cracks that through point and cover

edged and Sehwag drops a sitter, Dilshan had dropped Sehwag on nought and Sehwag here has returned the favour, some away swing for Zaheer and nips away further after pitching, Dilshan plays at it, gets a thick edge and among the easiest slip catches goes down at first slip
goodish length outside off and moves away further, leaves that one alone
short of a good length on leg stump, this one appeared to come back in, struck high on the pads, they get a single
beaten, Zaheer's got that one to swing in and it then holds its line after pitching, Tharanga steps forward and tries to defend that a little inside the line, just goes past the outside edge
gets it to swing in, bowled at 123kmph, a touch too straight in the end, clipped through square leg for a couple of runs

appeal for lbw and the umpire has given it out! That one swung in to the right-hander as well, landed on middle and leg and appeared to strike him in line as he tried to whip that off the back foot, would it have gone over? And did he get an inside edge? Umpire Oxenford's finger went up fairly quickly. We need to have another look, but Sehwag's lapse doesn't cost India much
swing for Irfan again,, landed outside leg, sliding on the pads, Sanga tried to clip it square, kissed the pads on the way to fine leg

edged and past the diving second slip, Irfan almost had him, short of a good length, swung away and then nipped away further after pitching, Sanga pushed at that one, got a thick edge but wide of the outstretched hands of second slip for a boundary
shorter and that's worked away off the back foot through square leg
short of a good length and this one moves away, Tharanga shoulders arms to let it through
wayward from Zaheer, too wide and it's called, Sangakkara had stepped out of the crease there
appeared to come back in, Sanga was caught on the thigh there, a single behind square
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and defends it to mid-on
too wide again, way too wide and it's the fourth of the innings so far
this one swung in to the left-hander, Tharanga meets this one with a straight bat, playing it back to the bowler
in the channel outside off and gets it to move away, shoulders arms to that one
Zaheer appears to be struggling for direction, another wide outside off stump
short of a good length outside off and nipped away, a very marginal one this, called a wide but it appeared to be alright
lands on a good length on the off, held its line this time, defended towards cover
Tharanga misjudged that one, was expecting it to move away but Zaheer brought it back in, got it to nip in and Tharanga shouldered arms to it
Irfan's turn to bowl a wide? Maybe not, may have just clipped the batsman's pads, short of a good length outside leg stump and Tharanga, who wanted to clip it fine, doesn't make contact
bowled at 126.9kmph, kept low after moving away, the batsman left it alone and Dhoni took it on the second bounce
in the channel outside off stump and that moved away, left it alone to the keeper
keeping low again, Sanga couldn't get his bat down in time, was short of a good length outside off and it zipped under his bat
getting it to shape away from the left-hander, a tempting length from Irfan but Sanga isn't tempted this time, leaves it be
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and knocks it down on the pitch
in the corridor from Zaheer and gets it to move back in after pitching, a fair amount of width this time and Tharanga opted to let it be
edged, and down to third man, but didn't go at it hard, goodish length and it went along the ground to the fielder in the deep
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and taps it down to cover
in the channel outside off, moving away from the left-hander, leaves that one alone
angling in towards Sanga, lands on off, gets forward and pushes it to mid-off
good comeback from Zaheer after that forgettable last over, left alone by Sanga again
ooh, Tharanga got across and tried to drive it through extra cover there, landed on a good length and trying to swing it away, got an inside edge onto the pads
bowled at 125.4kmph, shaping away from the left-hander, left alone to the keeper
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and taps it wide of mid-on for a single
short of a good length on the off, taps it towards point
getting swing still, trying to get Sangakkara to drive but Sanga is content letting those go by, for the time being
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and pushes it towards Kohli at point
meaty drive, pitched up from Zaheer, landed full albeit after swinging in a hint, Tharanga got to the pitch and eased it between extra cover and mid-off
goodish length and holds its line this time, Tharanga lets that one go
held it back a little this time, the ball held its line again, left alone to the keeper
swinging in towards middle, pushes it down the pitch past the bowler for three runs, nicely timed
gets forward and eases that wide of mid-off for a single
ooh, just fell short of Raina, there was width and it was fullish, Tharanga went at it hard, drove it straight to extra cover where it landed just in front of Suresh Raina
short of a good length on the off, defended towards point from the crease
straying on the pads and it's easy pickings for Sanga, whipped through square leg for three runs
short of a good length from Irfan and takes the batsman by surprise after getting it to bounce a little extra, pushed uppishly but short of point for a single
in the channel outside off and getting it to move away, Sanga leaves that one alone
goodish length on the off, rocks forward and defends it into the off side
bowled in the channel outside off stump and Sanga lets that one go through
bowled at 131.1kmph in the channel outside off stump, leaves that one alone to the keeper
goodish length on the off stump, rocks forward and taps it towards extra cover
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and knocks it down to point
well fielded at mid-on, that one swung in, pushed down the ground past that fielder but he dived to his right to keep them to a single
angling in towards middle, defends it down the pitch to the bowler
short of a good length, goes front and across to that one and taps it down to midwicket
short of a good length outside off, moving away and Tharanga leaves it alone
bowled that one short down the leg side, held its line, called a wide by the umpire
short of a good length again, knocks it down in front of midwicket and sneaks a quick single
pitched up on the off, driven uppishly but on the bounce to extra cover
short of a length on middle, turned into the leg side off the back foot
nicely bowled, got some late away movement there, Tharanga was squared up a hint there and got a thick outside edge past second slip, along the ground though, for a single
short of a length, gets an inside edge onto the pads as he tries to play that off the back foot, Tharanga wants the single and gets it
a full toss outside off, wayward and it's been wided by the umpire

that should go down as a chance, bowled at 134kmph, lands on a good length outside off and Sangakkara has a slash, gets a thick edge and Dhoni appears to go for it before backing off and thinking Sehwag would go for it, but he doesn't. Instead it's four runs. Dhoni should have gone for it
full and wide and Sanga goes after that one too, misses this time
a touch wide there, bowled at close to 140kmph, not called by the umpire, marginal, left alone by the batsman
an inswinging full toss and Sanga was taken by surprise, defended back towards the bowler
down the leg side, bowled at 136.1kmph, got some swing there but it was misdirected
a rare misfield from Kohli, full outside off and that was square-driven by Sanga, Kohli let it through at point for a couple of runs
yorker from Umesh, lands outside off and Sanga gets an inside edge behind square on the leg side for a single, Sri Lanka bring up their 50
flirting with that away-going delivery outside off stump and is beaten is Sangakkara
short of a good length on the off, taps it in front of Kohli at point, calls for the single but Tharanga sends him back
back of a length on middle, turned wide of square leg for an easy single
another wide, a shortish delivery down the leg side, there have been too many of these this innings
in the channel outside off stump, nipping away and he leaves that one alone
pitched up outside off stump, that's been dragged past midwicket for a single
short of a good length on the off, chopped down towards point
oh dear, the eleventh wide of the innings, this one's down the leg side from Umesh
lovely shot, pitched up and that's been elegantly driven past mid-off for a boundary, in the slot for Tharanga
short of a length outside off, lots of width and that's been crunched through point and cover for three runs, raises the 50-run stand
fired at 137.9kmph outside off stump, Sangakkara lets that one through
much fuller from Umesh outside off stump, Sanga tries to squeeze that towards third man, misses
Umesh gets that one to swing in towards Sanga, and it's defended towards point from the crease
superbly driven, that's his favourite shot, pitched up by Umesh and it's pushed firmly between mid-off and extra cover for three more runs, Zaheer gives chase and just manages to pull it back in
ooh, some turn there for Ashwin, was very slow through the air, lands on leg and turns towards off, took Sanga by surprise as he fended it away into the off side
this one holds its line, shortish on middle, pushed away off the back foot
shortish on the off and that's been tapped into the off side
gets on the back foot and pushes it through cover into the deep
there was an inside edge there, held its line, he came forward to defend, got an inside edge and it popped up but was well wide of Dhoni
reaches forward and stabs that one into the off side towards cover
shortish outside off, crunched past point into the deep for a single
reaches forward to that good-length ball and pushes it towards cover, a bit of turn there for Sehwag
steps forward and plays that one down the pitch, holds its line this time
turns away, gets on the back foot and punches it to deep cover
beaten by the turn, going round the wicket, angling in and then spitting away as Sanga gets forward to defend
gets on the back foot and works it behind square for a single
chopped behind point for three runs, Ojha gives chase
gets forward and defends that into the off side
angling in from round the wicket, misfield from Pathan at mid-off, that was driven towards mid-on where he fumbled, overran the ball and allowed them a second run
turn again for Ashwin, just a hint, enough to beat the outside edge as he steps forward to defend
too close to cut but he manages to get three more, managed to keep it down, some extra bounce for the bowler there, got it behind point
bowls that on a good length outside off, it holds its line and the batsman lets it go
short outside off, that's been cut down towards third man, just the single
manages to just clear cover, short and wide from Zaheer and Sanga sensed a chance, came down the track and managed to cut it over that fielder for a boundary
in the channel outside off, mistimes a drive back to the bowler, was aiming at extra cover
ooh, short of a good length outside off, Sanga pushed inside the line just a little there and oh, it also nipped away a hint, beaten
short of a good length, defended from the crease towards point, Gambhir fielders and targets the non-striker's end but Sanga is easily in
goodish length on the off stump and that's defended into the off side
extra bounce for Irfan there and Sanga didn't have much of an idea, shot off the pitch as he tried to play the cut and went past the outside edge
short and wide and he goes at it hard, flies off the outside edge, over first slip, for a boundary
pitched up from Irfan and Sanga drives it down towards mid-off, no run there
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and taps it back to the bowler
short of a good length on middle, turned towards midwicket from the crease
tossed up on middle, that's been played back down the pitch
slightly short outside off, tries to open the face on that one, misses
shortish outside off, makes some room and chops it towards short third

short and wide and after four dot balls, Tharanga looks for a release off a short delivery with some width, tries to slash it through point, gets a thick edge and it ricocheted off Dhoni's glove towards first slip
a bit of a leading edge there, gets forward and plays across the line to a delivery that holds its line, a wicket-maiden
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and drops it in front of point
goodish length on the off stump and it's been pushed back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, chops it through point into the deep for a single
shortish on the off, steps back and punches it towards extra cover
plays that one from the crease, shortish outside off and it's pushed in the direction of point
nips in, shortish on the off stump, worked away off the back foot through square leg for a single
gets forward and works that into the leg side
over the wicket to the right-hander, gets outside the line to that one and sweeps it over square leg for a single
slides that one down the leg side and it's been called a wide
flights it on leg stump, Sanga turns that one behind square for one more
flatter from Ashwin, gets forward, closes the face, drops it into the leg side and then takes off
ooh, that was the carrom ball from Ashwin, came in from the off stump, Sanga got onto the back foot and defended it into the leg side
floating it on the off stump, reaches forward this time and knocks it into the off side
shortish on middle and leg, punches it towards long-on for a single
slips that one down the leg side and it's been called a wide, the 13th of the innings, the spinners have got into the habit too
comes down the track and drives it down to long-on for a single
flat on middle, pushed off the back foot to midwicket
shortish outside off, holds its line, moves away to cut but can't make contact
Manoj Tiwary is on the field, not sure for whom, punched off the back foot and he dives full length to his right to stop that and prevent the single
another quiet over from Sehwag, just three off it, worked away off the back foot to square leg
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and plays it towards extra cover
slower through the air, gets forward and knocks it down into the off side
keeping it quiet, quicker one and flat this time, on the off stump, turned straight to midwicket
pitched up on the off stump, drives that down to long-off for a single
misses the carrom ball, Chandimal tries to reverse-paddle that over slip, it turned the other away and beat the bat
far better off playing the conventional sweep, tossed up on the off and he brings up the team century by sweeping that hard through square leg for a boundary, the first in 32 balls
round the wicket and has a slip, short on leg stump, turned off the back foot behind square for a single
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and whips it through square leg
flighted on middle, comes down the track and chips it wide of long-on for a couple of runs
tossed up on the off stump, drives it down to long-off for one more
shortish on leg stump, clipped past short fine into the deep for a single
that's been lofted over the bowler's head as well and this time he finds the boundary, there's a big gap between long-on and long-off and he bisects that, sweetly hit
knocks it down into the off side and races off, they get another run thanks to an overthrow
short of a length outside off, chopped past point into the deep for a single
tossed up on the off stump, gets forward and defends it towards cover
comes down the track and turns that one towards midwicket
flighted on middle, turns that in front of square, is not content with a single, rushes back for the second and raises his half-century, his 73rd in ODIs
shortish, gets on the back foot and punches it to long-on for a single
short of a good length on the off, knocks that down into the off side for a single
Chandimal has to go, short of a good length and a bit of away movement, Chandimal fishes for that one, gets a thin edge and is snapped up by Dhoni
pushed it full on the off stump, eases that through cover for a single
pitched on a length on the off stump and that's been driven back to the bowler
short of a good length on the off, defended towards extra cover from the crease
short of a good length, cut hard into the ground but straight to point
tossed up outside off, shortish, cuts that one down towards point
Mahela goes for the reverse-sweep and it pays off, a bit if width and he manages to get it past, uppishly, slip for a boundary
tossed up outside off, defended towards point, sneaks in a quick single and gets another one on the overthrow
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and works it into the leg side for a single
flighted on middle and turns down leg, not sure whether Sanga made contact there, stopped by short fine leg
short of a length on the off, gets on the back foot and punches it to extra cover
Short of a good length and he played slightly inside the line to that from the crease as he tried to defend it, got a thick edge along the ground to third man for a single
round the wicket to Sanga, pitched on a length and Sanga saw a chance to drive it through extra cover, gets an inside edge onto the pads
back of a length outside off, guided that one past point into the deep, wide of third man, for a couple of runs
slower one from Umesh, bowled at 105.6kmph, defended towards cover, no single on offer there
bowled at 133.7kmph, on a good length on the off stump, drives it back to the bowler
another slower one and Sanga doesn't pick it this time, was the offcutter, came down the track and ended up missing it as Dhoni took it on the bounce
a bit of extra bounce for Ojha there but well handled by Mahela, who gave himself a bit of room and chopped it past point, Sehwag gave chase, dived and just managed to drag it back in
knocks it down into the leg side off the back foot, a single

trapped in front is Mahela! Angling in from round the wicket and it held its line, Mahela had made his mind up to play the paddle-sweep, struck him in line, but we need another replay to see if that would have gone on to hit the stumps, the umpire thought so and Sri Lanka are in trouble now
gets forward and defends it into the off side
rocks forward and pushes it in front of cover
flighted on middle, gets forward, to the pitch, and defends it on the pitch, an excellent over
bowled at 136.7kmh, short of a length outside off, cut away towards deep point for a single
short of a length, punched off the back foot into the deep for a single
bowled that full outside off, mistimed a drive past point, Ashwin took a while to get to that from the deep, two to Sanga
shortish on the off, punched from the crease towards extra cover
slower one from Umesh, that's been tapped towards point, no single on offer there
bowled that full outside off, pushed wide of long-off, Zaheer keeps them to a single
shortish on middle, works it off the back foot past midwicket for a single
short of a good length outside off, crunched off the back foot to deep cover for a single
slides that one down the leg side, Ojha joins the list too of bowlers who've bowled wides this innings
short outside off, cut down towards deep point for a single
angling in towards middle, rocks forward and defends it towards cover
a bit of away-turn there for Ojha, that's been defended towards cover, there's time to sneak in a single
shortish outside off, guided to Zaheer at short third, they manage another quick single
about time Sanga, pitched up from round the wicket and he gets a chance to free his arms, rocks forward and flays that over extra cover for a boundary, past Zaheer at long-off
angling in towards middle, worked away in front of Gambhir at fine leg for a couple more runs
bowled that one full outside off, struck that straight to midwicket
slower one bowled on a good length outside off, knocked down behind point for a single
short of a good length on the off, defended off the back foot towards cover
short of a good length on the off, works past mid-on for a single
on the off stump, gets on the back foot and pushes it back to the bowler
slightly short, gets on the back foot and works it behind square for a single
short of a length outside off, cracked towards deep cover for a single
floating it on the off stump, gets forward and turns it through square leg for a single
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and punches it to long-on for a single
tossed up on middle, gets forward and defends it into the off side
Sanga begins the Powerplay with a boundary, short and wide, slashes it above point, well wide of third man, for a one-bounce four
goodish length on the off, gets a thick inside edge as he tries to push it into the off side, called for a single but then decided against it
goodish length again, pushes it towards mid-off, a mistimed stroke that
short of a good length, turned towards square leg, short fine runs across and cuts it off
pitched outside leg and struck Mathews high on the pads as he tried to turn it, they pick a leg-bye
Sanga's stepping it up now, came down the track there, took it from a length and dispatched it over the umpire's head for a boundary, 10 off that first Powerplay over
appeal for lbw turned down, Mathews went for the paddle there, landed on middle, the umpire reckoned there was an inside edge there, otherwise he seemed to have been struck in line
comes down the track and tries to stab it into the off side, pops up off the pads
well, the fielding today, generally, has been poor and a misfield at extra cover produces four runs, right through the fielder's legs there, struck hard by Sanga
taps it down towards short third to pick a quick single
the carrom ball, short of a good length, punched off the back foot straight to mid-off
short of a good length on middle, turned wide of short fine leg for a single, thinks of a second but it's not there

Mathews has been caught at cover and Sri Lanka have lost another one, made room, had made up his mind there, short of a good length and his intention was to clear the field on the off-side, mistimed it and spooned an easy catch to Gambhir, appeared to be a slower one from Zaheer
banged in short on middle and Thirimanne kept it down, though was ruffled up by it. Caught him on the glove and then the helmet grill
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it to cover
slower one bowled short of a good length, played into the vacant midwicket region for a single
short of a good length on the off, drops it in front of point for a quick single
angling in from round the wicket on middle, worked off the back foot to midwicket
bowled that one flat from round the wicket, cracked hard but straight to deep cover
moved away and cracked it through deep cover for a single
ooh, was the carrom ball, tossed up, tried to drive him through cover, got an inside edge onto the pads
slower one bowled on a good length outside off, much slower through the air, pushed wide of point
short of a length and he tries to pull him over midwicket, a pacy delivery, ends up getting a thick outside edge and three more runs
short of a length outside off, swatted it towards deep cover for a single
didn't pick the slower one, change of pace from Zaheer, Lahiru tried to smash that over midwicket, was into the shot too early, Dhoni concedes a bye
short of a length outside off, smashed hard but on the bounce to Kohli at deep cover
slower one from Zaheer on middle, Lahiru took his bottom-hand off that one as he played it into the leg side for a single

Five runs conceded, should have just been a single, a fielder was moved from leg to off for this one delivery, Sanga dug it out towards point but the fielder there couldn't resist aiming for a direct hit at the non-striker's end even when the batsman was making it comfortably, no one there to back up, and it's five runs
slightly short outside off, crunched towards deep cover

given out lbw, the carrom ball, that spun in towards Lahiru, Ashwin was bowling round the wicket, Lahiru went across to work it into the leg side, missed and was caught on the pads. The umpire Martinez gave it out immediately, though the question is whether or not it would have missed leg. We'll need another replay for that. Meanwhile, Lahiru has to go
slower through the air, waiting for it to turn away and chopped it past point for three runs
gets back and punches it to deep cover for a single, moves to 99
quicker ball bowled short outside off, tried to swat it down the ground, got a top edge but it landed safe behind extra cover
A century for Sangakkara, his 14th in ODIs, gets on the back foot and pushes it towards long-on
slightly short on the off, punched back towards the  bowler
flighted on the off, that's been swept towards deep square leg for a single
shortish on the off, slapped towards long-on for a single
tossed up on the off, pushes it towards long-off for a single
some turn for Ojha, that's been worked past square leg for a single
short outside off, swatted hard wide of long-off, Kohli gets across, slides and keeps them down to a couple
tossed up on middle, gets across and drives that down to deep midwicket for a single
the carrom ball bowled from round the wicket, pushes it back to the bowler
quicker through the air, short outside off, tried to cut it through point, some extra bounce for Ashwin, just beat the outside edge
worked off the back foot wide of midwicket for a well-run couple, a direct hit at the striker's end from the edge of the circle but Sanga has made it back
tossed up on middle and off, drives it down to long-off for a single
tossed up on middle, turned past midwicket for a single, Sri Lanka may have left it too late here
Perera's taken him on, tossed up and he charged down the track, took it off a length and smashed it over the long-on boundary
was shaping up for another big one, but that appeared to stop on him for a bit, jabbed it towards extra cover
swept down to deep backward square leg by Sanga for a single
short outside off, slammed towards deep cover for a single
flighted from Ojha and Sanga senses a chance, moves away and crashes it over extra cover, sweetly struck, it's a one-bounce four

appeal for a run-out, fetches that from outside off stump, drags it wide of deep midwickt, a throw on the bounce from the deep, Dhoni collects and flips it onto the stumps, Sanga's trying hard to make it back for the second, his bat appears to be on the line at the time that the bails are dislodged. It may just be on the line, and the umpire's taking his time. A close call that, the angle from behind the stumps seems to give a clearer indication but since it's a very close call, and not 100% conclusive, the benefit of the doubt has gone to the batsman. Not out, says the third umpire
Irfan this time overruns the ball and concedes a second run
short on middle from round the wicket, punched past midwicket for a single
Sanga makes some room to that delivery heading towards middle and gets a single to mid-off
short outside off, cut away towards Irfan at point, no run this time
flighted on the off, struck hard, on the bounce, towards long-on for a single
pushed away into the off side for a single, chance of an overthrow but it's backed up ultimately
picks the gap, Umesh bowls a short ball from round the wicket and it's pulled away behind square, into that gap between fine leg and deep square leg
short and it's half-pulled but straight to deep square leg for a single this time
short outside off and that's struck hard in front of Kohli at deep cover for a couple more runs
Kohli's been made to work, short and wide and this one's cut past point this time, two more as Kohli is made to run to his right
pushed it fuller, that's been driven to long-off for a single
Sanga keeps strike after working that one through square leg into the deep
full outside off, squeezes it wide of third man, really fine, for a couple of runs, that's also the 50-stand
charges down the track and Zaheer holds back the length, smacked to long-on for a single
excellent fielding by Ojha at deep midwicket, was short and was slammed in that region, Ojha ran to his left and palmed it back in with his left hand, two more
banged in short and Perera, who was committed to a pull, went after that one, it caught the glove and he got it over the keeper's head for a boundary
length ball from Zaheer, it's been struck wide of long-on for a couple more runs, didn't get hold of that one. One short, signals umpire Oxenford, Perera it was
pitched up, in the zone for Perera who thrashes it over the bowler's head, powerfully hit and he gets a boundary
pitched on a length on middle, driven towards long-on for a single
fired on middle and off, cracks it towards long-on for a single
Sanga makes a bit of room and drives that wide of Kohli at deep cover for a couple of runs
Misfield from Kohli, another boundary, attacked the ball there which was struck to his left at deep cover but couldn't collect it, let it through and that's four
yorker length this time from Umesh, dug out towards the bowler, Sanga didn't know where the ball was, Umesh picked it up and tried to aim at the striker's end, Sanga was in the way
yorker length again and another dot ball, dug out into the off side and no chance of a single this time either
full and wide and Perera has a wild swing at that one, not a wide, didn't connect, dot ball
that's a wide, definitely, Perera lets that one go, well past that marker on the off side
in the slot and Perera is livid he didn't connect, went big and he missed out, was on a length, he'll be disappointed
nicely played but straight to square leg, full outside off but he found a perfectly-positioned Umesh Yadav, just the single, the pressure builds
good over from Irfan, close to that marker but not quite a wide, Sanga was aiming at extra cover, three dot balls
walked well across and tried to play him past short fine but all he manged in the end was a single, caught the glove there
Too quick for Dhoni, pitched up and Perera went after that one too, got a thick edge and past a diving MS Dhoni who leapt to his left but could not get his hands to it, flew past him for a boundary
got him, he's bowled him, Sanga moved well across to scoop that fine but missed, that was aimed at leg stump from round the wicket and that's where it was heading when Sanga failed to make contact
short of a good length, struck high on the pads as he tries to pinch a single on the leg side, was high, they get a leg-bye

low full toss and that's been drilled towards long-off, Raina collects and scores a direct hit from the deep to catch Herath short as he attempts a second, Umesh did it smartly there, didn't collect the throw, allowed it to roll onto the stumps, Herath is run-out
short ball on the off, slapped towards long-off for a single
short of a good length outside off, moves away to cut it past point, misses
shortish on the off, pushed through to deep point for a single, Malinga will take strike next over
bowled it full on the off, pushed towards extra cover for a single
called a wide, length ball outside off, Perera didn't make contact as he tried to smash that down the ground
holes out, that pitched on a length and he smashed it straight but didn't get hold of it, found Virat Kohli at long-on, Perera walks back, though we may just have Kula walk in
short and wide, goes for the cut but cannot connect
pushed it on a length, driven towards deep cover for a single
Malinga gets a thick outside edge as he made room to crash that over extra cover
pushed it full on the off, drives that straight to extra cover
slower one bowled full, drives it down to long-on for a single
lovely sound of bat hitting ball, picked the slower one and thwacked it high and handsome over deep midwicket for a six
Umesh goes round the wicket now and bowls it short, mistimes a pull to midwicket
he's dealing well with the short ball, quick this time and it's been punished through square leg for a boundary
Malinga, you beauty, Umesh is being thrashed, a length ball and he gets under that one, in the slot and it's hammered for a flat six over the bowler's head, Umesh can only manage a smile
back to over the wicket for Umesh, sliced over the extra-cover fielder, they didn't go for the single, India have won
